Header: Former Presidential Chief of Staff and ex-STC Chairman re-remanded
Content: President’s Former Chief of StaffDr. Kusumdasa Mahanama and former Chairman of the State Timber Corporation P.Dissanayake in remand custody over bribery allegations have been further remanded. The suspects are charged with receiving 20 million rupees after demanding a sum of 540 million rupees from an Indian firm for the vesting of equipment and buildings belonging to the Kantale Sugar Company. They were again produced in the Colombo Chief Magistrate’s Court today. The Chief Magistrate said that there are no significant facts to granting bail. Accordingly the suspects were re-remanded until the 18th of this month.
